query:
INSERT INTO action_templates (name, category, description, priority, timeline, estimatedCost, consequenceOfDeferral, confidence, uniformatCodes, isSystemTemplate) VALUES
('HVAC System Replacement', 'HVAC', 'Complete replacement of heating, ventilation, and air conditioning system including all ductwork, controls, and mechanical equipment.', 'medium_term', '3-5 years', 150000.00, 'System failure leading to occupant discomfort, increased energy costs, and potential health and safety issues. Emergency replacement costs 30-50% more than planned replacement.', 80, '["D30"]', 1),
('Roof Membrane Replacement', 'Roofing', 'Remove existing roof membrane and install new high-performance membrane system with proper flashing and drainage improvements.', 'short_term', '1-3 years', 85000.00, 'Water infiltration causing interior damage, mold growth, structural deterioration, and significantly higher repair costs. Emergency repairs during winter months cost 40-60% more.', 75, '["B30"]', 1),
('Electrical Panel Upgrade', 'Electrical', 'Upgrade main electrical panel to meet current code requirements and increased capacity needs. Includes new breakers, wiring, and safety devices.', 'short_term', '1-3 years', 25000.00, 'Electrical hazards, code violations, inability to add new equipment, potential fire risk, and insurance complications.', 85, '["D50"]', 1),
('Plumbing System Modernization', 'Plumbing', 'Replace aging plumbing fixtures, pipes, and water distribution system. Includes water-efficient fixtures and modern materials.', 'medium_term', '3-5 years', 45000.00, 'Increased risk of pipe failures, water damage, higher water bills, and potential health code violations. Emergency repairs cost 2-3x planned replacement.', 70, '["D20"]', 1),
('Structural Foundation Repair', 'Structural', 'Repair foundation cracks, improve drainage, and stabilize structure. May include underpinning, waterproofing, and crack injection.', 'immediate', '0-1 years', 120000.00, 'Progressive structural damage, water infiltration, compromised building integrity, and exponentially increasing repair costs. Safety hazard requiring immediate evacuation.', 65, '["A10", "A20"]', 1),
('Exterior Envelope Restoration', 'Building Envelope', 'Repair and restore building exterior including cladding, windows, doors, and weatherproofing. Improves energy efficiency and weather resistance.', 'medium_term', '3-5 years', 200000.00, 'Continued water infiltration, energy loss, interior damage, mold growth, and deterioration of structural components. Deferred maintenance increases costs by 15-25% annually.', 75, '["B20"]', 1),
('Fire Protection System Upgrade', 'Fire Safety', 'Upgrade fire alarm, sprinkler, and suppression systems to meet current fire codes. Includes new detectors, control panels, and sprinkler heads.', 'short_term', '1-3 years', 75000.00, 'Code violations, insurance complications, increased fire risk, potential occupancy restrictions, and liability exposure.', 80, '["D40"]', 1),
('Elevator Modernization', 'Conveying', 'Modernize elevator system including controls, motors, safety features, and cab finishes. Improves reliability and meets accessibility standards.', 'medium_term', '3-5 years', 180000.00, 'Increased breakdowns, safety concerns, accessibility code violations, higher maintenance costs, and potential service interruptions affecting building operations.', 70, '["D10"]', 1),
('Interior Finishes Renewal', 'Interior', 'Refresh interior finishes including flooring, wall coverings, ceilings, and paint. Improves aesthetics and addresses wear and tear.', 'long_term', '5+ years', 95000.00, 'Continued deterioration of appearance, potential health concerns from worn materials, reduced property value, and tenant dissatisfaction.', 75, '["C30"]', 1),
('Site Drainage Improvement', 'Site Work', 'Improve site drainage including grading, catch basins, and underground piping. Prevents water accumulation and foundation damage.', 'short_term', '1-3 years', 55000.00, 'Foundation damage, landscape erosion, ice formation hazards, basement flooding, and progressive deterioration of building envelope.', 80, '["G30"]', 1)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2g8chP3aro94bni.root --database XnmtZZwX6e46H8JVZbq4Ta --execute INSERT INTO action_templates (name, category, description, priority, timeline, estimatedCost, consequenceOfDeferral, confidence, uniformatCodes, isSystemTemplate) VALUES
